articles.description: A former FC Barcelona manager made a colossal statement on Lionel Messi, after his performance for Inter Miami in their Leagues Cup quarter-final. | Football News
articles.content: Lionel Messi continued his goal-scoring streak as Inter Miami sealed a 4-0 win vs Charlotte in their Leagues Cup quarter-final, at the DRV PNK Stadium in Florida on Saturday. It was his eighth goal i… [+2500 chars]

articles.title: "Now quite rare; for him it's natural" - Jannik Sinner heaps praise on Gael Monfils; calls him 'an important character' after Canadian Open QF victory - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Italian tennis star Jannik Sinner recently heaped praise on Gael Monfils after the duo's clash in the quarterfinal of the 2023 Canadian Open.
articles.content:
Italian tennis star Jannik Sinner recently heaped praise on Gael Monfils after the duo's clash in the quarterfinal of the 2023 Canadian Open.
